product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Future Wealth Gain IV
product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Future Wealth Gain IV is a ULIP savings plan offering the dual advantage of protection and long-term market-linked wealth growth with flexible portfolio strategies, loyalty additions, and return of mortality charges.
key_highlights: Option to select high life cover with Sum Assured multiplier
Loyalty Additions every 5 years starting from end of 15th policy year
Return of Mortality Charges (ROMC) at maturity
Family Benefit for existing Bajaj Life customers
Settlement option to receive death or maturity benefit in installments
Top-up premium option for extra contributions
Premium reduction and premium payment term change allowed after 5 years

core_benefits.details: Fund Value payable on survival to maturity date, provided policy is in force.
Higher of (Prevailing Sum Assured OR Regular Premium Fund Value) plus higher of (Top-up Sum Assured OR Top-up Fund Value).
core_benefits.guarantee: Minimum Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of total premiums paid till date of death.
core_benefits.note: Sum Assured is reduced by partial withdrawals from Regular Fund during last 2 years before death.

core_benefits.details: Added at the end of every 5 policy years starting from the end of 15th policy year onwards, based on average daily fund value of last 3 years.
Total mortality charges deducted throughout policy term are added back at maturity (or end of 15th year, whichever is later).
Extra maturity benefit if any family member is an existing Bajaj Life policyholder.

switching_rules.free_switches: Unlimited free switches under Investor Selectable Strategy
switching_rules.wheel_of_life_restriction: No switching allowed under Wheel of Life Strategy

premium_rules.minimum_premium: Depends on chosen term and mode

sum_assured_rules.reduction_rule: Reduced after partial withdrawals in last 2 years

partial_withdrawals.post_withdrawal_balance: Fund value must remain ≥ 2× Annualized Premium

change_ppt.conditions: Must be exercised before existing PPT expiry

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI guidelines.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: Nominee receives Fund Value as on date of death intimation within 12 months.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Future Wealth Gain IV adds Loyalty Additions every 5 years starting from the end of the 15th policy year based on average fund value.
ROMC adds back total mortality charges deducted throughout the policy term at maturity if premiums are fully paid.
Policyholder can choose Investor Selectable Strategy with free switching or Wheel of Life Strategy with maturity-based allocation.
Partial withdrawals are allowed after 5 years with minimum ₹5,000 and maximum 50% of Regular Fund Value.
Death and maturity benefits can be taken in installments over 5 years with each installment increased by 0.5%.
